titleStmt.title: A Book of the valuations of all the ecclesiasticall preferments in England and Wales entituled Nomina & valores omnium & singulorum archiepiscopatuum, episcopatuum, archidiaconat', decanat', præbendarum, ecclesiarumque paroch' infra regnum ac dominia Angliæ ac omnium altarum promotionum quarumcunque spiritualium infra eadem, quæ ad solutionem decimæ partis earund' Dom' Regi & Reginæ nuper tenebantur.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
